docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.text:

    index.md  # The documentation homepage.

<?php

echo "qwe";

docs.title: Clipboard
docs.text:
<a href="#" class="js-clipboard"
    data-text="Copy this text"
>Copy this text</a>

docs.title: JS-click-submit
docs.text:
<a href="#" class="js-click-submit"
    data-method="GET"
    data-confirm="Submit?"
    data-url="#"
    data-toggle="tooltip"
    title="Submit"
>Reload</a>

docs.title: Commands

• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.

docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.

docs.title: fileForm
docs.text:
{!! Lte3::fileForm('avatar', [
    'html' => '<div><a href="/icon.png" class="js-popup-image"><img src="/icon.png"></a></div>',
    'url_save' => route('lte3.data.save'),
]) !!}

{!! Lte3::formOpen(['action' => route('lte3.data.save'), 'files' => true]) !!}

docs.title: Example
docs.text:
{!! Lte3::formOpen([
    'action' => route('lte3.data.save'),
    'model' => null,
    'files' => true,
    'method' => 'POST'
]) !!}
    {!! Lte3::text('firstname', 'Thomas') !!}
{!! Lte3::formClose() !!}

docs.title: Multiple files
docs.text:
{!! Lte3::mediaFile('images', $modelHasMedia, [
    'label' => 'Images',
    'multiple' => true,
    'is_image' => true,
]) !!}

Visit documentation for more examples and information about the plugin.

docs.title: radiogroup
docs.text:
{!! Lte3::radiogroup('size', 'm', ['s' => 'Small', 'm' => 'Medium', 'l' => 'Large',], ['label' => 'Size:']) !!}

 {!! Lte3::radiogroup('chanel', 'tg', ['tg' => 'Telegram', 'email' => 'Email', 'sms' => 'SMS',], [
    'label' => 'Toggle Block:',
    'map' => [
        'tg' => ['.js-block-tg'],
        'email' => ['.js-block-email'],
        'sms' => ['.js-block-sms'],
    ],
]) !!}
<h3 class="js-block-tg">Telegram!</h3>
<h3 class="js-block-email">Email!</h3>
<h3 class="js-block-sms">SMS!</h3>

{!! Lte3::radiogroup('brand', 'samsung', [
        'apple' => ['label' => 'Apple', 'url' => route('lte3.data.save', ['brand' => 'apple'])],
        'samsung' => ['label' => 'Samsung', 'url' => route('lte3.data.save', ['brand' => 'samsung'])],
        'xiaomi' => ['label' => 'Xiaomi', 'url' => route('lte3.data.save', ['brand' => 'xiaomi'])],
    ], ['label' => 'Submit to URL:', 'submit_methor' => 'POST'])
!!}

docs.title: For save/create tags
docs.text:
{!! Lte3::select2('domain', 'canceled', ['canceled' => 'Canceled'], [
    'label' => 'Domain',
    'multiple' => true,
    'max' => 1,
    'url_tags' => route('lte.data.tags'),
    'help' => '* Select one or create ;'
]) !!}

{!! Lte3::select2('tags', '4', ['4' => 'Auto'], [
    'label' => 'Tags',
    'multiple' => 1,
    'max' => 4,
    'url_tags' => route('lte3.data.tags'),
    'separators' => "[';']",
    'new_tag_label' => ' [NEW]',
    'help' => '* Enter new end ;'
]) !!}

docs.title: With show/hide blocks
docs.text:
{!! Lte3::select2('driver', 'smtp', ['log' => 'Log', 'smtp' => 'SMTP', 'sendmail' => 'Mail'], [
    'label' => 'Mail Driver',
    'empty_value' => '--',
    'map' => [
        'smtp' => ['.block-smtp'],
        'log' => ['.block-log'],
        'sendmail' => ['.block-sendmail'],
    ],
    'help' => '* Change for show block'
]) !!}

<div class="block-smtp" style="display:none"><h2>SMTP Block</h2></div>
<div class="block-sendmail" style="display: none;"><h2>SENDMAIL Block</h2></div>
<div class="block-log" style="display: none;"><h2>LOG Block</h2></div>

docs.title: text
docs.text:
{!! Lte3::text('firstname', 'Thomas') !!}

{!! Lte3::text('lastname', 'Mann', [
    'readonly' => 1,
]) !!}

{!! Lte3::text('email', 'f@app.com', [
    'type' => 'email',
    'max' => '30',
    'label' => 'Your Email',
    'help' => '* Enter Email',
    'prepend' => '<i class="fas fa-envelope"></i>',
    'append' => '<i class="fas fa-check"></i>',
    'checkbox' => ['name' => 'verify', 'title' => 'Verify', 'value' => 0, 'readonly' => 1,]
]) !!}

{!! Lte3::text('Password', null, ['type' => 'password']) !!}

{!! Lte3::text('url', null, [
        'type' => 'url',
]) !!}

docs.title: Summernote
docs.text:
{!! Lte3::textarea('message', 'Hello Summernote!', [
    'label' => 'Message',
    'class' => 'f-summernote',
]) !!}

or

<label>Message</label>
<textarea class="f-summernote" rows="3">Hello Summernote!</textarea>

Visit Summernote documentation for more examples and information about the plugin.

docs.title: Codemirror
docs.text:
{!! Lte3::textarea('message', 'Hello Codemirror!', [
    'label' => 'Message',
    'class' => 'f-codeMirror',
]) !!}

or

<label>Message</label>
<textarea class="f-codeMirror" rows="3">Hello Codemirror!</textarea>

Visit CodeMirror documentation for more examples and information about the plugin.

docs.title: CKEditor 4
docs.text:
{!! Lte3::textarea('message', 'Hello CKE Mini!', [
    'label' => 'Message',
    'class' => 'f-cke-mini',
]) !!}

{!! Lte3::textarea('message', 'Hello CKE Small!', [
    'label' => 'Message',
    'class' => 'f-cke-small',
]) !!}

{!! Lte3::textarea('message', 'Hello CKE Full!', [
    'label' => 'Message',
    'class' => 'f-cke-full',
]) !!}

or

<label for="">CKE Full</label>
<textarea class="form-control f-cke-full"></textarea>

Visit CKEditor 4 documentation for more examples and information about the plugin.

docs.title: treeview
docs.text:
{!! Lte3::treeview('models', [
    'label' => 'Ajax data',
    'method_get' => 'GET',
    'url_tree' => route('lte3.data.treeview', ['selected' => [2,4]]),
]) !!}

{!! Lte3::treeview('models', [
    'label' => 'Static data',
    'data' => $treeviewArray,
]) !!}

Visit documentation for more examples and information about the plugin.
